Key Match Events: Chet Holmgren recorded 25 points and 9 rebounds for the Oklahoma City Thunder.
Isaiah Joe scored 7 points in limited playing time.
Shai Gilgeous-Alexander led the Thunder with 28 points and 8 assists.
Aaron Gordon contributed 12 points and 9 rebounds for the Denver Nuggets.
Nikola Jokić had 16 points and 12 assists but struggled with 9 negative plus-minus.
Michael Porter Jr. scored 15 points but had a -2 plus-minus.
Jamal Murray added 12 points for the Nuggets but also had a -2 plus-minus.
Post-Match Reflections: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander expressed satisfaction with the team's performance despite the loss.
Nikola Jokić acknowledged the tough night for the Nuggets and praised his teammates' efforts.
